ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 351
ygData.msgSnippet: wow; 50K.  I spent around 1 to 2 k on tinkering and my skill is at 102. ... The MOB and CROWD Controller Mob on me, HELL you will go ... Register for your free
ygData.messageBody:
wow; 50K. I spent around 1 to 2 k on tinkering and my skill is at 102.


On Sun, 04 February 2001, EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>
>
> There are 3 messages in this issue.
>
> Topics in this digest:
>
> 1. Re: I need advise please
> From: "Funky T. Munky" <toking@...>
> 2. Re: I need advise please
> From: "Aranathes Bonethrower" <aranathes@...>
> 3. Re: I need advise please
> From: "Dr. Boskonovitch" <boskonovitch113@...>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 1
> Date: Sat, 3 Feb 2001 06:12:51 -0500
> From: "Funky T. Munky" <toking@...>
> Subject: Re: I need advise please
>
> hmmm, i thought they made the bolts stackable, prolly remembering wring
>
> and 50k???
> thats nutty, im at ~158 with a 20k investment (and I'm a nec with a cha of
> 55)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Madgrizzle <MadGrizzle@...>
> To: <EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, February 02, 2001 4:20 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] I need advise please
>
>
> > You skill level is at least 50. All gnomes start with that. Go to
> > www.tinkering.org and check out the information there. If money is an
> > issue, then don't even bother. I've dumped over 50,000pp into it so
> > far. Only have skill of 158. Regardless, make lanterns until
> > trivial. That's the first item to make.
> >
> > Atinky Eveready
> >
> > At 08:58 PM 2/2/2001 +0000, you wrote:
> > >I would like to know exactly what item i should start tinkering first
> > >to raise my level. I am currently a 16 Gnome Rogue, and have made
> > >(albeit with a few failed attemps) fishing poles, fire water, 1 cam,
> > >flameless lanterns, and 1 mechanical lockpick. I have seen the
> > >trivial message with lanterns, fishing poles, and fire water. I know
> > >my skill level is around 26-28, and i dont want to spend any more
> > >money then i have to.
> > >
> > >Thanx
> > >Varios
> > >
> > ><note> Gnomish Bolts are shockingly expensive, and non-stackable
> > >items suck.
> > >
> > >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
>
>
>
> ________________________________________________________________________
> ________________________________________________________________________
>
> Message: 2
> Date: Sat, 3 Feb 2001 05:42:03 -0600
> From: "Aranathes Bonethrower" <aranathes@...>
> Subject: Re: I need advise please
>
> Some of us raised our skill to around 150 before they put in the gnomish
> power gloves and catapults. At that time, you had to raise skill from 104
> by doing aqualungs at 200+pp an attempt, and at 104 skill, you didn't have
> alot of sucess at making them. I am at 165 skill, and have a net loss of
> around 50 or 60k total.
>
> Ghirardelli
> E'ci
>

> Subject: Re: I need advise please
>
> I got my skill to 110 before powered gloves were discovered. Because of this it cost me about 25k to get to 148 skill. Since reaching 148, I've made 82 attempts at rebreathers and have only one skill increase to show for it. =(
>
> What has anyone else's skill increase rate been on rebreathers?
>
> Boskonovitch
> Frustrated Tinkerer on Fennin Ro, stuck at 149
